title: FS: 31 T206 Cards From GD+ To VG/EX 9/5 Through 9/7 Take 15% Off
author: btcarfagno

posts.post_title: FS: 31 T206 Cards From GD+ To VG/EX 9/5 Through 9/7 Take 15% Off
posts.post_content:
FRIDAY SEPTEMBER 5 THROUGH SUNDAY SEPTEMBER 7 TAKE 15% OFF MY PRICES LISTED FOR ANY T206 CARD

All of these cards are VG or VG-EX. Very nice condition on these. I will mention any issues individually that may not be clear with the scans.

Bradley Portrait...Front only crease from middle of top border to 1/2 inch down from top of right border. $25

Camnitz Arms Folded...No creases. SOLD

Camnitz Arms Above Head...Tiny corner crease bottom left. SOLD

H. Davis...No creases. Light chipping at border. $48

Devlin...Corner crease bottom left and tiny 1/4 inch crease from top border. $25

Donlin Batting...No creases. SOLD

Dooin...Crease across face and tiny speck of paper loss on front. $25

Dougherty Fielding...Small corner crease bottom right. $34

Doyle Batting...Very light front only wrinkle left to right of card between first and second shirt buttons. Spots of tobacco. $24

Geyer...Small corner crease lower right. Small 1/4 inch crease right border. SOLD

Goode...Two extremely light front only creases that go length of card left to right also faint front only creases in lower right corner. $23

Hallman...Tiny 1/4 inch front only wrinkle by left eye. SOLD

Herzog Standing...No creases. SOLD

Howell Standing...Back only 1/4 inch crease from bottom border. Two specks of paper loss front. $28

Jacklitsch...No creases. SOLD

Kling...No creases. SOLD

Konetchy Glove High...Small corner crease lower right. Lipstick?? $34

Liebhardt...Barely noticible 1/4 inch front only wrinkle. SOLD

Lindaman...No creases. $40

Manning Hands Over Head...Crease from top border by wrist to right border through glove arm. SOLD

McIntyre...Corner crease lower right. SOLD

Merkle Throwing...Back only 1/4 inch surface crease middle of card. SOLD

Myers Batting...1/2 inch crease left border near bottom. SOLD

Nichols Batting...1/4 inch front only crease above cap. 1/2 inch light crease throgh face. $30

Pfeffer...1/2 inch front only crease from top border to right border. 1/4 inch front only crease from bottom border after name. $30

Powell...No creases. $26

Reulbach No Glove...No creases. Small paper loss back left corner. SOLD

Rucker Portrait...1/2 inch crease lower left corner. SOLD

Stahl No Glove...crease from left border to middle of forehead. $30

Wilhelm Batting...Light front only 1/2 inch crease top right corner. SOLD

Zimmerman...No creases. SOLD
